name: Tic Tac Toe_CMD
description:
Recreation of very famous TIC TAC TOE game  “X O” by windows Command Prompt “CMD” 
Without any GUI libraries or any third party just, the default Microsoft windows patch programming language.

You can play it solo vs computer or local melty player with another one. 

This game is very small in a size just 40kb.

Of course, This game doesn’t require any think just download it and enjoy...
